dcterms:description: Multilingual dataset for unrestricted coreference resolution, including Arabic, Chinese, and English. Contains coreference information along with other annotation layers such as part-of-speech tags, syntactic parses, word senses, named entities, and semantic roles.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2012 Shared Task: Multilingual Unrestricted Coreference Resolution
